name: 呂怜樺
objective: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用以及多益考試練習，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
schedule:
1　　
READING #1　　
Introduction to Main Structure Analysis　　
* analyse patterns of "incomplete sentence" test (Reading Section Part5) and "text completion"
test (Reading Section Part6)

2　　
READING #2　　
Grammar Review to Defeat TOEIC　　
* learn about the strategic approaches to develop specialisation in cognitive trap avoidance and
choice elimination

3　　
READING #3　　
Grammatical Influence on Answer
Detection Tactics　　
* specialize in answer detection and distractor avoidance techniques
* boost specific-field vocabulary acquisition (General Business)

4　　
READING #4　　
Strategy Adoption　　
* Strengthen tactics to conquer Part5 and Part6
* boost understanding of main structures in English

5　　
READING #5　　
Basic to Intermediate Practice　　
* enhance comprehension of techniques adopted to detect the correct answer
* familiarize the higher-level patterns of test
* boost specific-field vocabulary acquisition (Office Issues)

6　　
READING #6　　
Advanced Practice　　
* ensure the effectiveness of answer capture and choice elimination methods
* boost specific-field vocabulary acquisition (Hospitality Industry)

7　　
GRAMMAR
& VOCAB
OVERVIEW　　
Overall Picture of Techniques　　
* review and enhance comprehension of all algorithms

9　　
READING #7　　
Reading Comprehension
Section (Part7)
Single passage
Double Passages　　
* the organization of various forms of letter, article, and transaction
* bolster tactical means to scope and seize correct answer precisely within time limitation
* learn about algorithms and 3 key factors how to knock out reading comprehension section
(part7)
* develop the areas of mastering reading comprehension part and techniques to tackle
problematic issues such as limited time allocation
* practice strategic procedures to beat double passages

10　　
LISTENING #1　　
Photograph Question-Response　　
* encourage the preparation to grasp answer with methodologies to avert from deceptive
choices
* learn about homonym recognition strategies adopted to master trap avoidance

11　　
LISTENING #2　　
Conversation Talks　　
* practice the efficient stages to overcome long conversations and monologues

12　　
LISTENING #3　　
Advanced Practice　　
* practice the wider range of advanced level tests
* ensure the effectiveness of answer capture and choice elimination methods

13　　
LISTENING
OVERVIEW　　
Listening Comprehension Section
Overview　　
* review and enhance comprehension of all algorithms


14-17　　
EXAMINATION　　
Simulation Test #1　　
* learn about overall tactics and enhance comprehension of strategic methodologies
scorePolicy: 出席, 多益模擬考試, 上台報告
materials: 多益新制黃金團隊全真試題+詳解; 洪鎮杰/ 李住恩/ NEXUS多益研究所著  EZ叢書館
